============================================
core/always/always_event_6
============================================

module a ();

always @(comb1 or comb2 or comb3 or comb4) begin end

endmodule

----

    (module_nonansi_header
      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (list_of_ports))

      (always_construct
        (always_keyword)
        (statement

            (procedural_timing_control_statement

                (clocking_event
                  (event_expression
                    (event_expression
                      (event_expression
                        (event_expression
                          (expression
                            (primary
                              (hierarchical_identifier
                                (simple_identifier)))))
                        (event_expression
                          (expression
                            (primary
                              (hierarchical_identifier
                                (simple_identifier))))))

                          (primary

                              (simple_identifier))))))
